resources.string: Wait until node is churned out
Deposit your USDC into a Circle account and earn yield. Securely within your Vultisig vault.
Funds remain fully under your vault\'s control. Circle accounts are self-custodial and yield is generated through secure off-chain treasuries.
Keep devices on the same WiFi Network, correct vault and pair devices.\nMake sure no other devices are running Vultisig.

Hold $VULT to unlock lower trading fees.
By holding 1,500 $VULT, you\'ll unlock the Bronze Tier and receive a 5 bps trading fee discount on all swaps.
By holding 3,000 $VULT, you\'ll unlock the Silver Tier and receive a 10 bps trading fee discount on all swaps.
By holding 7,500 $VULT, you\'ll unlock the Gold Tier and receive a 20 bps trading fee discount on all swaps.
By holding 15,000 $VULT, you\'ll unlock the Platinum Tier and receive a 25 bps trading fee discount on all swaps.

What are the benefits of using Vultisig?
Can I recover my assets if I lose a device?
What are the fees and costs?
What cryptocurrencies are supported by Vultisig?
It is a secure, multi-authentication wallet based on MPC technology that is used to manage digital assets. Transactions require approval from multiple devices.
Vultisig offers enhanced security with multi-device authentication, support for many blockchains, easy recovery options, and no seed phrases or user tracking.
Yes, as long as you saved and have access to your backups when creating the vault. You can import these backups on a new device to regain access to your assets.
Vultisig securely stores and manages digital assets. All actions, such as sending or swapping, require the threshold of devices to sign transactions.
Vultisig is free to use. Only standard network fees apply to sending. And for swaps and bridges, there\'s a 0.5% (50 bps) fee.
Vultisig supports major cryptocurrencies and tokens, with over 30 chains and their tokens, currently available.
I agree with the amount I will receive after the swap

Ensure you leave enough funds to cover the fees. If an account balance falls below 1 DOT (Existential Deposit), the account will be deactivated (reaped) and any remaining funds will be lost. You can reactivate the address with a new deposit larger than the existential deposit at any time. However, this will not recover the lost funds.
Transaction time out due to slow signing. Please try again.
This address is not valid for %s
Label must be between 1 and %d characters

Ensure you leave enough funds to cover the fees. If an account balance falls below 1 XRP (Existential Deposit), the account will be deactivated (reaped) and any remaining funds will be lost. You can reactivate the address with a new deposit larger than the existential deposit at any time. However, this will not recover the lost funds.

This occurs because the password is used to locally encrypt the backup file, similar to how a hard drive is encrypted. In the following step, you have the option to add a hint.

We recommend that you do not set a backup password for device vault shares-your data is safe if the backups are properly stored in different locations, which is already a significant protection. Remember, backup passwords can\'t be recovered if you forget them. Your choice!

The referral program is applied for THORChain swaps and is on a best effort basis. You need to register a THORName to use the Vultisig referral. The registration fee is 10 RUNE and 1 RUNE for each year, which is paid to the THORChain network.

Turn your vault into a rewards machine. Create your referral now and start earning
Is Vultisig open source and audited?
How does Vultisig handle privacy and data protection?
How does Vultisig compare to other multisig wallets?
Yes, Vultisig is open source and has undergone security audits. Both the audit reports and the source code are accessible.
Vultisig does not store any user information from its mobile apps.
It is built on MPC technology, which eliminates the need for seed phrases and supports multiple blockchains, making Vultisig flexible and chain-agnostic.
Keep all your important addresses organized in one place.
Unstaking cannot be performed if balance is below 1

If you choose to add a password, this will be used to encrypt the backup file.
Remember: If you forget your vault password, it cannot be reset or recovered.
By default, your backup is secure without an extra password, since you store Vault shares in different locations.

Bandwidth Points are required for every transaction on TRON, including both standard token sends and smart contract interactions. Every TRON user receives 600 free Bandwidth Points per day, which can cover approximately two basic sends. Additionally, you can earn extra Bandwidth Points by staking TRX, increasing your daily balance to support more transactions. If you have enough Bandwidth Points, you can send tokens, stake TRX, or interact with smart contracts without paying TRX in gas fees.

Required for more complex actions, such as interacting with smart contracts (e.g., swaps or dApp transactions). Unlike Bandwidth, Energy is not given for free—you need to stake TRX to earn Energy. (More advanced users can also acquire Energy through leasing mechanisms such as JustLend or Tronify’s Energy rental markets). However, having Energy can significantly reduce or even eliminate the gas fees for smart contract interactions, making Energy valuable for those who use TRON dApps frequently.
